text: Hi <@U2H3TT8F2> do you have any thoughts on this matter?

Hi Jamie, from a quick glance, I would say that your link here:
```<a class="skip-to-content-link" href="#main-content">
  Skip to content
</a>```
is looking for an ID on a div and not a class. You would want to link it to the ID. So in your template, the body content would have something like:
```<main id="main-content" class="...">
your main content
</main>```
do you have a link to your site I can reference?
